News.headline: Matchday Mascot Package
News.short_description: A perfect gift for any young Dagger!
News.description:
Why not buy your child the opportunity to lead out the Daggers XI in one of our League games this season.

For just £150.00 give your child a present they'll remember forever, the package includes:

•    Photo and personal write up in the matchday programme
•    Full Dagenham & Redbridge kit (either home or away)
•    Opportunity to join the squad in the pre-match warm up
•    Lead the team onto the pitch prior kickoff,
•    Photographic memento of the day
•    Three tickets in the Carling Stand

For more information contact our Commercial Department by email: commercial@daggers.co.uk or by phone: 020 8592 1549 ext:33
